entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 07:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
